allow: Bash(# Find journals - check common locations find ""/Users/printer/Library/CloudStorage/Dropbox"" -iname ""*journal*"" -o -iname ""*Journal*"")
Bash(# Check which launchd services are actually loaded/running launchctl list)

Bash(# Check if bot.py writes to a log or if there''s a nohup.out / screen log ls -la /Users/printer/atlas/nohup.out ; ls -la /Users/printer/*.out ; ls -la /tmp/bot* # Check /proc or lsof for fd output on the bot pids lsof -p 70189)
Bash(# Check actual log locations - both root and logs/ dir cat /Users/printer/atlas/logs/daily_brief.log)
Bash(# Check if JeevesUI has a Telegram bot component using the same token grep -r ""TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN\\|getUpdates\\|telegram"" /Users/printer/clawd/JeevesUI/.env*)
Bash(# Check launchd for any atlas/bot plist launchctl list)

Bash(xargs -I{} curl -s -X POST https://api.minimax.chat/v1/chat/completions -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'Authorization: Bearer {}' -d '{""model"":""MiniMax-01"",""messages"":[{""role"":""user"",""content"":""say hi""}],""max_tokens"":20}')
